column6: Description
Property Homepage with key metrics, hyperlinking to quick reports across Resident Activity, Maintenance, Unit Statistics, and Traffic. Property calendar. Ability to search for residents.
Availability status of all unit types across the property

column5: Reliant on Analytics Team, BE Complete
column6: Detailed report of the status of all units by unit type. Highly important
Dashboard to view and approve Invoices and Purchase Orders based on configured workflows for different types of invoice

Interface to view all the information associated with a given tenant. Roommates can be viewed but with minimal information. Used predominantly to access contact info, view the tenant's ledger, and add attachments or new information like vehicles or pets. Also used to update resident's status.

column5: Not Accounted For, Reliant on Analytics Team
column6: Property overview report detailing Availabiity, Resident Activity, and Leasing funnel conversion. Highly important.

column5: BE Complete, Reliant on Analytics Team
column6: Over a given time period. Derived only from current lease statuses.

column3: Rent Roll (+ Rent Roll with Lease Charges)
column5: BE Complete, Reliant on Analytics Team
column6: Report of all units in the property and their current tenant, market rent, actual rent, and lease information

column5: BE Complete, Reliant on Analytics Team
column6: Summary of the number of leases expiring in each month over a given time period by Unit Type or Property

column5: BE Planned / In Development, Reliant on Analytics Team
column6: Report outlining the current concession statistics and concession spend by Unit or Unit Type
Interface to view your own approvals from any given workflow
Several components to add and manage invoices

column5: Reliant on 3rd Party Tool, Minimally Planned
column6: Overview of key leasing metrics at the property

column5: Reliant on 3rd Party Tool, Minimally Planned
column6: Backlog of inbound prospect communication to be actioned by the Leasing team
Various reports on historic and outstanding work orders at the property

column5: Reliant on Analytics Team, BE Planned / In Development
column6: All permutations of rent for all unit types and floor plans at the property
Several components to add, post to ledger, and manage Purchase Orders
All amenity fees for all unit types by amenity tag
Interface to manually review and approve vendors that have passed through VendorShield
Used to post scanned checks to a ledger. Usually done in batches.

column5: Reliant on 3rd Party Tool, Minimally Planned
column6: Detailed, agent-color-coded calendar of upcoming appointments, move-ins, and move-outs
Updates copy and design for specials banner on property website

column5: Not Required in DeepSky, Not Accounted For
column6: Comparison of actuals to budget for the property's P&L. Updated regularly with notes for any variance by PM. Ability to click into any given line item to see underlying ledger entries.
Interface to produce and view variaous receivables reports; predominantly Aged Receivablss and Delinquency
Interface to review and update the cateogry, status and priority of any given work order
Residents under eviction within a gien time period
Interface to search for, report on, and review and complete payables
Used to check and close a resident's ledger after they Move Out and create a final Move Out Statement
Used to populate renewal offers for a given set of leases
Property's Income Statement over a selected time period
Property's Cash Flow Statement over a selected time period
Itemized view into all entries to the GL over a given time period
Unpaid resident charges over a given time period

column5: BE Complete, Reliant on Analytics Team
column6: Rent and leasing (loss to lease) metrics for all Units and Floorplans, including rent per sq/ft

column5: BE Planned / In Development, Reliant on Analytics Team
column6: Comparison of Agent performance used to calculate commissions.
Property's Balance Sheet
Report of currently occupied and available rentable items, for example bike storage
Deposit statuses for all tenants in a given time period
Function to easily add a charge to a given ledger. Usually used by Assistant PMs to add charges to resident ledgers.

Used to check and update the current and allowed payment methods for all residents. Predominantly used to allow residents that were only allowed to pay in 'Cash' to pay online again after they completed a late payment.

column5: Reliant on 3rd Party Tool, Minimally Planned
column6: Interface for vendors to submit insurance documentation and, once approved, invoices.

column5: Reliant on 3rd Party Tool, Minimally Planned
column6: Yardi service that verifies the insurance of each vendor manually by communicating with the vendor's insurance directly. Usually provides a judgement within 2-3 days. Hugely important.
Single company email for vendors to send invoices. Yardi automatically processes invoices and places them in the appropriate workflow to be approved.
Returns details for each floorplan
Returns property information set in Yardi to display on the Flow website: office hours, address, amenities.
Intiates the creation of an application for a prospect from the Flow website
Returns pricing for each unit to display on the Flow website

column5: Minimally Planned, Reliant on 3rd Party Tool
column6: Intiates the creation of an appointment for a prospect from the Flow website
Returns the source of a given prospect based on the communcation method used to book an appointment
Returns the ledger history for a given tenant over a given timeframe. Used to look at resident ledgers to see if they made a payment outside of the FOL App
Returns all units in the building and their associated rents
Returns the list of properties that the Yardi user has access to
Returns all unsettled transactions for the user
Returns all unsettled transactions for all residents in the building
Creates a charge to a given ledger
Registers a payment on a given ledger. Does not directly relate to a specific charge: we input business rules in Yardi to determine how payments are allocated to outstanding charges on a ledger.
Overview of units that need to be Made Ready at the property
Project management tool for each work order within each Unit Turn
Overview of work orders at a property over a given time period. Voyager and Mainenance IQ are out of sync on completed work orders

column5: Reliant on 3rd Party Tool, Minimally Planned
column6: Allows Leasing Agents to email prospects from within CRM Flex. Not used by Support (using Zendesk)
Dashboard to track necessary documents to be submitted for applications to progress.
Dashboard to track and manage the application pipeline
Powerful search function used to search for residents, documents, leases, etc. Far superior to Voyager search function
Used by Leasing Agents to manage their prospect's applications
Used by Leasing Agents to calculate lease charges for part of a month.
Allows Leasing Manager to digitally sign approved leases.
Allows Maintenance Manager and Technicians to review, update, categorize and prioritize a given work order. Also able to associate a third party vendor to the work order.
Communication layer between property market rents and availability and the ILSs.
Automatically links phone number or email a prospect uses to make an appointment to their source eg. Google.
System to manage the imagery on property websites and ILSs
Manual, floorplan by floorplan interface to update market rents
Used to update rent at an individual unit level on the website
Report into outstanding approved payments to be made. Ability to click into the histoy and invoices and workflow approvals for any item
Used by Support and Leasing to add an invidivual charge to a resident's ledger. For instance for a Key Fob.
Used to add one-off documents like lease addendums for pets to the Lease
Current Vehicles on registered on the property

column5: Minimally Planned, Reliant on 3rd Party Tool
column6: Prospect details and leasing report for all prospects over a given time period. Used by PM to verify Commissions.
Activity for all Unit Types or by Property. Predominantly used to track residents on Month to Month leases. Hyperlinks into individual residents for each category.
Used by Support to troubleshoot resident issues by viewing what the resident sees in their Portal
Interface used to reconcile Insurance details by tenant in Yardi with Assurant report

column5: BE Planned / In Development, Reliant on Analytics Team
column6: Simple analytics of Maintenance Team's recent performance

Overview of the screening decision and status for all applicants over a given time period. Screening works integrates with CRM Flex and displays screening decision for each prospect. Dashboard used predominantly by Leasing Manager.
Manual, floorplan by floorplan interface to update amenity fees for different floorplans
